summary: **Python Developer** with **3 years of experience** in **backend development, data processing, and automation**. Proficient in **Flask, FastAPI, and Django**, with a strong foundation in **API development, database management, and cloud deployment** using **AWS and GCP**. Experienced in **building efficient and maintainable systems**, integrating **data pipelines**, and collaborating with **frontend developers and data teams**. Adept at **writing clean, reusable code**, optimizing **performance**, and implementing **security best practices**. Passionate about **solving real-world problems** through well-structured and scalable software solutions.

projects.name: Swine Fat Measurement with Computer Vision
details: Developed an automated system for measuring pig carcass fat thickness using YOLOv8 and Computer Vision.
Achieved high accuracy with a Mean Absolute Error (MAE) of ±0.43 cm.
Designed a real-time processing system with a processing rate of 19 FPS.
Built user-friendly web applications for batch, video, and real-time input using FastAPI and Next.js.
Collaborated with Betagro to enhance the efficiency of pig processing operations.

projects.name: Research Paper Multilabel Classification
details: Classified research papers into 18 subject areas using TF-IDF and a OneVsRestClassifier with LinearSVC.
Built a machine learning pipeline integrating preprocessing, feature extraction, and model training.
Used multi-label binarization and TF-IDF to transform text into structured numerical data.
Optimized the model with hyperparameter tuning via GridSearchCV, achieving an F1-score of 0.54 and recall of 0.50.
Developed a modular workflow with Airflow to streamline data extraction from Scopus API and model training.

projects.name: Enhancing Food Distribution Efficiency with Ant Colony Optimization
details: Designed an optimized delivery system for Pizza Hub’s cloud kitchens using Ant Colony Optimization (ACO).
Processed food delivery datasets from Kaggle to calculate optimal routes considering customer demand and delivery distances.
Built a graph representation of the network, leveraging Python libraries such as NetworkX, Pandas, and Numpy.
Modeled pheromone-based routing strategies with ACO, iterating parameters for best efficiency.
Automated data processing with Python and visualized results using Matplotlib.

projects.name: AI-Powered Travel Assistant
details: Designed an interactive chatbot for travelers using Google Cloud Vision API and Text-to-Speech
Leveraged Google Gemini LLM to provide engaging and informative travel recommendations
Enabled landmark recognition through image inputs, offering users personalized travel insights

projects.name: Wordpress application automation deployment
details: Automated deployment of WordPress on AWS using Terraform for Infrastructure-as-Code.
Provisioned EC2 instances, VPCs, and S3 for media storage, ensuring high availability.
Integrated security best practices to restrict database access to internal network traffic only.
Transformed business requirements into functional implementations using Visual Basic .NET and SQL
Modified database structures to align with evolving business needs, ensuring efficient data migration and relational integrity
Developed stored procedures for data retrieval and manipulation
Migrated legacy data into modern systems while maintaining data integrity
Built backend systems with Node.js and integrated with React-based frontends for robust performance.
Customized Strapi CMS to streamline internal banking processes for TTB Bank.
Improved application reliability by applying automated unit tests.
Analyzed team workflows to measure task allocation efficiency using Excel and presented actionable recommendations
Identified process inefficiencies and proposed solutions, including resource optimization
Enhanced task management efficiency by collaborating across departments

Capstone Project: Swine Fat Measurement with Computer Vision-Developed an automated swine fat thickness measurement system using YOLOv8, Computer Vision, and FastAPI, achieving significant accuracy improvements over manual methods.

interests.title: Areas
details: Financial payment systems, driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions in the banking industry.

certificates.title: Google Cloud Skill Boost
certificates.description: Earned multiple badges through Google Cloud Skill Boost, demonstrating proficiency in infrastructure building with Terraform and language processing with ML. Highlights include expertise in AI and machine learning, generative AI with Vertex AI, and baseline infrastructure (GCP) setup.

certificates.title: Google Data Analytics
certificates.description: Expertise in data preparation, processing, and visualization using spreadsheets, SQL, Tableau, and R.

certificates.title: ETHGlobal Bangkok Hackathon
certificates.description: Participated in ETHGlobal Bangkok Hackathon competition, building 'HaveFun(d)'—a fundraising platform with Web3 and Web2 integration, utilizing Hedera as the destination chain.
